Name: Commander Pixel
Description: Once the pinnacle of gaming entertainment, Commander Pixel led an elite squadron of virtual heroes through countless digital battles. However, after a fateful encounter with a glitch named 'The Corruption', his screen was shattered, and his reality forever changed. Now wearing shades to hide his broken screen and scars, he roams the digital plains of WebtrES Club, a solemn reminder of the fragility within the coded world. Despite the damage, his soldier buttons remain intact, always ready to command his forces and defend the land from rogue viruses and bugs. With his hand perpetually down, he signals a calm demeanor, though the strategic mind within is always plotting the next move in the cybernetic chess game that has become his existence.
